title: Log-in issues.
body:
Hi,

Just letting everyone know its not just them who is unable to login to league due to a timeout, as you probably guessed by a few other post here. The help article linked from the error message is here: https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761944

I ran the Hextech Repair Tool as admin, and double checked everything was in order. Ran through the list of things to try manually to make sure after it failed again, then came here only to see several other post with the same issue.

Hopefully its fixed soon. I use Comcast in the U.S.. if that helps for any reason :).

replies.body: There were some login issues during this period, but everything should be okay now.  Any server issues will be posted on our [service status](http://status.leagueoflegends.com/#na) page, so I recommend bookmarking it!  If you have any issues still let me know!

> [{quoted}](name=Porocles,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=el00unoT,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2016-09-20T21:34:52.903+0000)
>
> There were some login issues during this period, but everything should be okay now.  Any server issues will be posted on our [service status](http://status.leagueoflegends.com/#na) page, so I recommend bookmarking it!  If you have any issues still let me know!

I do not recall any service status being posted regarding this issue, despite it going on for 3+ hours and over a 100 replies/topics (combined..) created total during this time about it. So  bookmark the boards too and check for unusual spikes of people having the same issue, just to make sure its not just you :)
I also use Comcast in the U.S. Same issue. havnt been able to connect for 2 hours now
